```{r import-data, message= FALSE}
# Run a check and summarize results
animals <- read_tsv(h("raw-eidith-data", "Animal.tsv.gz")) %>% 
  filter(Country == country)

knitr::kable(count(animals, SpeciesScientificName))
```
